text: Polling for a friend here, how many of ya'll try and support outlook with all its wonky wackadoodle quirks?
Depends on your audience and if it needs to be supported. We do have subscribers that open our emails with Outlook, so we support it.
<@UKGV272KS> does HubSpot have user client data? like g-analytics with browser data?
Thereâ€™s some email client metrics within the email analytics after being sent yes, but more specific email client analytics requires another platform like Litmus.
